content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position (0, 0)
Consists of steam engine (position (0, 1)), boiler (position (0, 2)), and offshore pump (position (0, 3))

### Copper plate mine at position (1, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position (1, 1)) and a furnace at position (1, 2)
- Burner mining drill (position (1, 3)) and a furnace at position (1, 4)
- Burner mining drill (position (1, 5)) and a furnace at position (1, 6)

### Copper cable factory at position (2, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine at position (2, 1) and inserter at position (2, 2) that puts into the assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position (2, 3)) that connects the furnace at position (1, 2) to the assembling machine at position (2, 1)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting items
- Ensure you have the required ingredients in your inventory before attempting to craft items. For example, iron-plates are needed to craft iron-gear-wheels, and you cannot craft if you lack the necessary items.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it. 

### Errors when inspecting furnace inventory
- Verify that the furnace is operational and contains items before inspecting its inventory to avoid confusion about its status.
